effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.

short_effect.sword_shield: Seeds the target after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Seeds the target after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Seeds the target after inflicting damage.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Seeds the target after inflicting damage.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Seeds the target after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.
